Discover Class. More...

#include <Discover.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for Discover:

Detailed Description

This class is a list menu for discovering other Fogo users using the radio.

virtual Element* Discover::event_handler ( int  event,

This method is called on the current Element when an event (e.g., Element::ENTER, Element::UPDATE, Element::TOP_PRESS) happens.
